long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DataTrack Pro is a Chrome extension designed to simplify the management and tracking of browsing data. It offers features to save URLs and capture associated names, providing users with an organized interface to access this information efficiently.

𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
𝙎𝙖𝙫𝙚 𝙐𝙍𝙇𝙨 𝙖𝙣𝙙 𝙉𝙖𝙢𝙚𝙨: Users can input URLs manually or capture them from the current tab. Additionally, the extension allows capturing names associated with web pages.
𝙊𝙧𝙜𝙖𝙣𝙞𝙯𝙚𝙙 𝙈𝙖𝙣𝙖𝙜𝙚𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩: DataTrack Pro offers options to save entries by name or URL. Users can remove individual entries or clear all saved data. Entries are displayed separately, distinguishing between saved and deleted entries for better organization.
𝙐𝙨𝙚𝙧-𝙁𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙣𝙙𝙡𝙮 𝙄𝙣𝙩𝙚𝙧𝙛𝙖𝙘𝙚: With a clean and intuitive UI design, the extension provides customizable buttons and select menus for ease of use. Real-time feedback is provided for actions such as saving, removing, and displaying entries.

𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝘁𝗼 𝗨𝘀𝗲:
𝙎𝙖𝙫𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙀𝙣𝙩𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙨:
Enter the URL manually or capture it from the current tab.
Capture names associated with web pages.
Choose whether to save by name or URL.
𝙈𝙖𝙣𝙖𝙜𝙞𝙣𝙜 𝙀𝙣𝙩𝙧𝙞𝙚𝙨:
Remove individual entries by clicking the trash can icon.
Clear all saved data or deleted entries with one click.
Display Options:
𝘝𝘪𝘦𝘸 𝘴𝘢𝘷𝘦𝘥 𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘰𝘳 𝘥𝘦𝘭𝘦𝘵𝘦𝘥 𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘳𝘪𝘦𝘴 𝘴𝘦𝘱𝘢𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦𝘭𝘺.
𝘌𝘢𝘴𝘪𝘭𝘺 𝘴𝘸𝘪𝘵𝘤𝘩 𝘣𝘦𝘵𝘸𝘦𝘦𝘯 𝘥𝘪𝘴𝘱𝘭𝘢𝘺 𝘮𝘰𝘥𝘦𝘴 𝘶𝘴𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘥𝘳𝘰𝘱𝘥𝘰𝘸𝘯 𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘶.

DataTrack Pro simplifies the process of managing and tracking browsing data, offering a convenient solution for users who want to stay organized while browsing the web. Try it out today!
